abstract: South Korea Pres Park Geun-hye, recognizing seriousness of fifth nuclear test by North Korea, warns that situation on peninsula could escalate into war; calls for unified efforts to halt North's nuclear ambitions.
lead_paragraph: President Park Geun-hye ruled out dialogue with the North, saying that its nuclear program was “not a bargaining chip” but a “present and urgent threat.”
snippet: President Park Geun-hye ruled out dialogue with the North, saying that its nuclear program was “not a bargaining chip” but a “present and urgent threat.”...

headline.main: South Korea’s President Warns of More Provocations From North
